mapper.sql: id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, `status`, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId

SELECT i.id, i.`softwareName`, i.`APKName`, i.`softwareSize`, d.`valueName` AS flatformName, c.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel1Name, a.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel2Name, t.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel3Name, o.`valueName` AS statusName, i.`downloads`, v.`versionNo`, i.`status`, i.`flatformId`, i.`categoryLevel1`, i.`categoryLevel2`, i.`categoryLevel3`, i.versionId FROM `app_info` i INNER JOIN `data_dictionary` d ON (d.valueId=i.`flatformId` AND d.`typeCode`='APP_FLATFORM') INNER JOIN `app_category` c ON (c.`id`=i.`categoryLevel1`) INNER JOIN `app_category` a ON (a.`id`=i.`categoryLevel2`) INNER JOIN `app_category` t ON (t.`id`=i.`categoryLevel3`) INNER JOIN `data_dictionary` o ON (o.`typeCode`='APP_STATUS' AND o.`valueId`=i.`status`) LEFT JOIN `app_version` v ON (v.`id`=i.versionId)
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.`softwareName`, i.`APKName`, i.`softwareSize`, d.`valueName` AS flatformName, c.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel1Name, a.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel2Name, t.`categoryName` AS categoryLevel3Name, o.`valueName` AS statusName, i.`downloads`, v.`versionNo`, i.`status`, i.`flatformId`, i.`categoryLevel1`, i.`categoryLevel2`, i.`categoryLevel3`, i.supportROM, i.interfaceLanguage, i.appInfo, i.logoPicPath FROM `app_info` i INNER JOIN `data_dictionary` d ON (d.valueId=i.`flatformId` AND d.`typeCode`='APP_FLATFORM') INNER JOIN `app_category` c ON (c.`id`=i.`categoryLevel1`) INNER JOIN `app_category` a ON (a.`id`=i.`categoryLevel2`) INNER JOIN `app_category` t ON (t.`id`=i.`categoryLevel3`) INNER JOIN `data_dictionary` o ON (o.`typeCode`='APP_STATUS' AND o.`valueId`=i.`status`) LEFT JOIN `app_version` v ON (v.`id`=i.versionId) where i.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into app_info (softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, `status`, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId) values (#{softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APKName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flatformId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

categoryLevel2,
logoPicPath,

versionId,

mapper.update:
update app_info
softwareName = #{softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APKName = #{APKName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supportROM = #{supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interfaceLanguage = #{interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
softwareSize = #{softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
devId = #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
appInfo = #{appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
onSaleDate = #{onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offSaleDate = #{offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flatformId = #{flatformId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel3 = #{categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT},
downloads = #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
categoryLevel1 = #{categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryLevel2 = #{categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT},
logoPicPath = #{logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logoLocPath = #{logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
versionId = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update app_info set softwareName = #{softwareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APKName = #{APKName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supportROM = #{supportROM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interfaceLanguage = #{interfaceLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, softwareSize = #{softwareSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, devId = #{devId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, appInfo = #{appInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, onSaleDate = #{onSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offSaleDate = #{offSaleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flatformId = #{flatformId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel3 = #{categoryLevel3,jdbcType=BIGINT}, downloads = #{downloads,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, categoryLevel1 = #{categoryLevel1,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryLevel2 = #{categoryLevel2,jdbcType=BIGINT}, logoPicPath = #{logoPicPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logoLocPath = #{logoLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionId = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from app_info where 1=1
and APKName=#{APKName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
